metadata.title: CVE-2023-52861 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: drm:bridge: it66121: Fix invalid connector dereference Fix the NULL pointerdereference when no monitor is connected, and the sound card is opened fromuserspace. Instead return an empty buffer (of zeroes) as the EDIDinformation to the sound framework if there is no connector attached.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
